Condition_summary_1: mitigation measures including fish rescue reporting, habitat offsetting, and compliance with SARA
Condition_summary_2: monitoring and reporting requirements for both mitigation and offsetting measures, including annual reports with data and photographs
Condition_summary_3: implementation of offsetting measures during construction phase with specific habitat enhancements
Condition_summary_4: prohibition on transferring authorization and requirement to maintain on-site documentation
Habitat_Type: river, lake, shoreline, spawning, resting, foraging
Offset_footprint_size: 880 m2 (river habitat from old dam removal), 400 m2 (Walleye spawning and resting), 895 m2 (shoreline/upperland), 720 m2 (lake to river habitat)
Boulder: additional boulders for Walleye spawning areas if washed out
